title: World War II Valor in the Pacific National Monument: Pre-Site Visits
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Pre-Site Visits              Pre-Site Visits          Â        Some educational programs require a pre-site visit.    During a pre-site visit, a ParkEDU team member will come to your computer lab or classroom and give a history of the National Park Service, focusing on the WWII Valor in the Pacific National Monument site.   The in-class portion of the ParkEDU visit should take no more than an hour per classroom visit.
